description: Individual physical element or part within a building system, based on IFC Element hierarchy and building construction practices

Component.description: The individual building element or part

System.description: The building system that contains this component

Function.description: The specific role or purpose this component serves

Material.description: The substance or materials the component is made from

Dimensions.description: Physical size, measurements, or geometric properties

Manufacturer.description: The company that produced the component

Installer.description: The party that installed or assembled the component

Location.description: Where the component is positioned within the building

Condition.description: Current state of repair, wear, or functionality

Installation_date.description: When the component was installed or replaced

Structural_Elements.IfcWall: Vertical building element for enclosure or structural support
Structural_Elements.IfcColumn: Vertical structural member supporting beams and slabs
Structural_Elements.IfcSlab: Horizontal structural element like floors or ceilings

Opening_Elements.IfcDoor: Building element providing access between spaces
Opening_Elements.IfcWindow: Building element providing light and ventilation

Covering_Elements.IfcCovering: Finish covering for floors, walls, or ceilings

framenet_examples.sentence: More often than not , ringers think of the church as something stuck on the bottom of the belfry .
`` Another women wrote from Sheffield to say that in her 60 years of ringing , `` I have never known a lady to faint in the belfry .
Far above in the belfry , the huge bronze bells , mounted on wheels , swing madly through a full 360 degrees , starting and ending , surprisingly , in the inverted , or mouth-up position .

ASLACTON , England -- Of all scenes that evoke rural England , this is one of the loveliest : An ancient stone church stands amid the fields , the sound of bells cascading from its tower , calling the faithful to evensong .
In the tower , five men and women pull rhythmically on ropes attached to the same five bells that first sounded here in 1614 .
`` To ring for even one service at this tower , we have to scrape , '' says Mr. Hammond , a retired water-authority worker .
It is a passion that usually stays in the tower , however .
`` They were a self-perpetuating club that treated the tower as sort of a separate premises , '' the Vicar Hummerstone says .
`` But C.J.B. Marshall , vicar of a nearby church , feels the fault is in the stairs from the bell tower that are located next to the altar .

example_sentences: The [Component concrete wall] in the [System structural system] provides [Function load-bearing support] for the upper floors.
This [Component HVAC sensor] monitors [Performance temperature and humidity] in the [Location conference room].
The [Component aluminum window] was installed by [Installer ABC Construction] using [Material double-glazed glass].
Each [Component steel beam] has [Dimensions 6 meters length] and was [Installation_date installed in March 2024].
The [Component reinforced concrete wall] provides [Function structural support] in the [System structural system].
Each [Component sensor] monitors [Performance temperature and humidity] in the [Location conference rooms].
The [Component steel beam] spans [Dimensions 6 meters] and supports [Function floor loads].

metadata.description: Building component frame for individual physical elements following IFC standards

training_examples.purpose: Semantic annotation training for building components
features: Frame element annotation with semantic types
